captions.text: Lovekiller

Your eyes that look at me
Are sometimes sexy, it makes me nervous

(What words do you want)
(Oh what do you want)

I can't hid it 
I like this romance

The conversation with you
The title is overcharge

My heart starts to run
I can't take me eyes off you

(I can't do anything)
I don't want to stop now
This dangerous feeling

I know you are a lovekiller
But I'm still attracted by you

Your phone doesn't answer
That bothers me (Bad my girl)

I know you are a lovekiller
But why do I still want you

(I know now, I don't care about your men)
You will only look at me

Whatever you do shakes me
I dream of you and me

(What do you want me to say )
(Oh I want you)

Even if you leave me today
I want to be more frank

I want to know you
As if I know nothing yeah

(I can't do anything now)
(I don't want to stop now)
I'll leave myself with you

I know you are a lovekiller
But I'm still attracted by you

Your phone doesn't answer
That bothers me (Bad my girl)

I know you are a lovekiller
But why do I still want you

(I know now, I don't care about your men)
You will only look at me

Bad woman bad woman
Whatever others feel in my eyes

The figure that is glimmering
I can't deny that, that moment you looked at me
You don't have to look at me

Just know that I'm here, whenever
You need me Let me know girl

Just don't say 
No girl just ride wit me

I know you are a lovekiller
But I'm still attracted by you

(I know now, I don't care about your men)
You will only look at me

Niel
Lovekiller
